>From: Colin Green <cgreen@...>

>Very impressive graphs John. How are you generating them?

Perl module GD::Graph.  Works pretty well, and is pretty easy to use.

>There's a definite rise in the current fitness graph, seems to be
>levelling off at the momement though.

Yep.  That happened last time, too.  Then as the current champions become 
stagnant and die off, all that is left are the less fit members, and so the 
max fitness graph could angle back downward for a time.
